# Required Packages

* shiny
* shinydashboard
* tidyverse
* DT
* caret
* ggfortify  

```{r}
library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(caret)
library(ggfortify)
```


# Run the Shiny app from your R studio

Use `shiny::runGitHub("ST558_project_3", "snprim", ref = "main", subdir = "breastCancer")` to run the app in your Rstudio.
